an8.49:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in the Eastern Monastery, the stilt longhouse of Migāra’s mother.
an8.49:4.2: Then Visākhā, Migāra’s mother, went up to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side.
an8.49:5.1: “Visākhā, a female who has four qualities is practicing to win in this life, and she succeeds at it.
an8.49:5.3: It’s when a female is well-organized at work, manages the domestic help, acts lovingly toward her husband, and protects his earnings.
an8.49:6.1: And how is a female well-organized at work?
an8.49:6.2: It’s when she’s skilled and tireless in doing domestic duties for her husband,
an8.49:6.4: She understands how to go about things in order to complete and organize the work.
an8.49:6.5: That’s how a female is well-organized at work.
an8.49:7.1: And how does a female manage the domestic help?
an8.49:7.2: It’s when she knows what work her husband’s domestic slaves, servants, and workers have completed, and what they’ve left incomplete.
an8.49:7.4: She knows who is sick, and who is fit or unwell. She distributes to each a fair portion of various foods.
an8.49:7.5: That’s how a female manages the domestic help.
an8.49:8.1: And how does a female act lovingly toward her husband?
an8.49:8.2: It’s when a female would not transgress in any way that her husband would not consider loveable, even for the sake of her own life.
an8.49:8.3: That’s how a female acts lovingly toward her husband.
an8.49:9.1: And how does a female protect his earnings?
an8.49:9.2: It’s when she ensures that any income her husband earns is guarded and protected, whether money, grain, silver, or gold. She doesn’t overspend, steal, waste, or lose it.
an8.49:9.3: That’s how a female protects his earnings.
an8.49:9.4: A female who has these four qualities is practicing to win in this life, and she succeeds at it.
an8.49:10.1: A female who has four qualities is practicing to win in the next life, and she succeeds at it.
an8.49:10.3: It’s when a female is accomplished in faith, ethics, generosity, and wisdom.
an8.49:11.1: And how is a female accomplished in faith?
an8.49:11.2: It’s when a female has faith in the Realized One’s awakening:
an8.49:11.3: ‘That Blessed One is perfected, a fully awakened Buddha, accomplished in knowledge and conduct, holy, knower of the world, supreme trainer of people, teacher of gods and humans, awakened, blessed.’
an8.49:11.4: That’s how a female is accomplished in faith.
an8.49:12.1: And how is a female accomplished in ethics?
an8.49:12.2: It’s when a female doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie,
an8.49:12.3: or consume alcohol and drugs, which cause negligence.
an8.49:12.4: That’s how a female is accomplished in ethics.
an8.49:13.1: And how is a female accomplished in generosity?
an8.49:13.2: It’s when she lives at home rid of the stain of stinginess, freely generous, open-handed, loving to let go, committed to charity, loving to give and to share.
an8.49:13.3: That’s how a female is accomplished in generosity.
an8.49:14.1: And how is a female accomplished in wisdom?
an8.49:14.2: It’s when a female is wise. She has the wisdom of arising and passing away which is noble, penetrative, and leads to the complete ending of suffering.
an8.49:14.3: That’s how a female is accomplished in wisdom.
an8.49:15.1: A female who has these four qualities is practicing to win in the next life, and she succeeds at it.”
an8.49:17.4: to well-being in lives to come.
an8.49:18.1: And so, a lady in whom
an8.49:19.3: a virtuous laywoman such as she
an8.49:19.4: is reborn in the realm of the Loveable Gods.”
